text: Marcia Griffiths (born November 23, 1949) is a Jamaican singer. She had "Electric Boogie" (also called the "Electric Slide") in the late 1980s as a hit single. Griffiths began her singing career in 1964. She usually performs reggae music. She was in a duet named Bob and Marcia. Griffiths was born in Kingston. ==References== Category:Jamaican singers Category:Jamaican reggae musicians Category:1949 births Category:Living people
title: Marcia Griffiths
